data.name: WorldBuilder
data.description: World Builder: An initial conditions generator for geodynamic modeling

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1

evidence: README indicates network usage: "We are now also experimenting with matrix chat ([#gwb:matrix.org](https://app.element.io/#/room/#gwb:matrix.org)). [Matrix](https://matrix.org) is an open source distributed chat protocol (a descripti"

"The Geodynamic World Builder (GWB) is an open source code library intended to set up initial conditions for computational geodynamic models and/or visualize complex 3d tectonic settings" (library used by other models).

"For each point in space, the GWB can return the composition and/or temperature. It is written in C++, but can be used in almost any language through its C and Fortran wrappers." (domain-specific modeling/initial-condition tool directly used in research workflows).
